Italian Chop Sandwich

A chopped Italian-style sandwich with ham, salami, pepperoni, Provolone, and a blend of vegetables, dressed with oregano, vinegar, and mayonnaise.

Yield: 2 sandwiches

Source: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/O7VWwEFH0x8

sandwich
italian
lunch

Ingredients

Main Ingredients

  • 1/4 head iceberg lettuce
  • 2 slices leg ham
  • 12 slices pepperoni
  • 6 slices salami
  • 8 cherry tomatoes
  • 1/4 red onion, thinly sliced
  • 1-2 pickled peppers
  • 50g (1.76 oz) Provolone cheese

Dressing

  • 1 tsp dried oregano
  • 3 tbsp mayonnaise
  • 1 tbsp red wine vinegar
  • 1 tbsp olive oil

Bread

  • 2 sub rolls

Optional

  • Topenade

Procedure

Preparation

  1. Place the lettuce, ham, pepperoni, salami, tomatoes, red onions, pickled peppers, and Provolone cheese on a chopping board.
  2. Chop everything until roughly 1cm x 1cm (about 0.4 inches x 0.4 inches).
  3. Add the oregano, mayonnaise, vinegar, and oil to the chopped ingredients and mix well.

Assembly

  1. Cut open the sub rolls and hollow out the center.
  2. If using optional topenade, smear onto the bread.
  3. Fill each roll with the chopped mixture.
  4. Close the rolls and enjoy.
